name: City Adventure(Hand Tracking)
summary:
Welcome to our city!

In this game, you can navigate through various cities. Each city is filled with urban dancers, a group of dance-loving folks! However, be careful not to harm them, as they will retaliate and attack you! Take out your array of gesture-recognized weapons and engage in thrilling battles with them! Victory shall belong to the brave! 

In the game, you have over forty gesture-recognized weapons at your disposal, which can be freely switched between. You can also pick up new weapons or...
